nodes.text: A Providence-class Dreadnought served as the flagship of Admiral Trench of the Confederacy navy at the Battle of Anaxes during the Clone Wars. Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and Clone Force 99 boarded the ship during the Republic's attack on the Anaxes assembly complex, killing Trench after he was forced into giving the disarm codes for the bomb in the complex's fusion generator. Skywalker retrieved the detonator for the ship's self-destruct mechanism and gave it to Wrecker to use.
